titles.title: CLEAR Act
CLEAR Act
Consistent Legal Evaluation And Regulation of Medical Products Act
A bill to deem certain products regulated by the Food and Drug Administration as drugs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Consistent Legal Evaluation And Regulation of Medical Products Act or the CLEAR Act
This bill requires the Food and Drug Administration to regulate contrast agents for medical imaging devices, radioactive drugs, over-the-counter monograph drugs, and ophthalmic drug articles (i.e., eye droppers) as drugs rather than medical devices.
